cast.overview: Fast-talking, quick-thinking Detroit street cop Axel Foley has bent more than a few rules and regs in his time, but when his best friend is murdered, he heads to sunny Beverly Hills to work the case like only he can.
cast.title: Beverly Hills Cop

details.biography: Gilbert Roland Hill (November 6, 1931 - February 29, 2016) was an American politician, police officer, and actor, who was the President of the Detroit City Council. As an actor, he was known for his role as Inspector Todd, Axel Foley's boss, in Beverly Hills Cop (1984), Beverly Hills Cop II (1987), and Beverly Hills Cop III (1994). He was married to Delores Hooks. He died on February 29, 2016 in Detroit, Michigan, USA.
details.name: Gilbert R. Hill
